short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to store and copy your prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Bank - Your Personal Prompt Manager

Simplify your workflow with Prompt Bank, the ultimate tool for saving, managing, and using your favorite prompts. Whether you're a writer, developer, or just someone who frequently uses prompts, this extension makes it easy to keep your ideas organized and at your fingertips.

Features:

-Save and categorize your custom prompts with ease.
-Access a library of suggested prompts for inspiration.
-Quickly insert saved prompts into any text field using the right-click menu.
-Seamlessly copy prompts to your clipboard for use in other applications.


Why Choose Prompt Bank?

-Prompts are stored locally, ensuring privacy and security.
-No remote code or data sharing â€“ everything stays on your device.
-Boosts productivity by streamlining repetitive tasks.
-Get started with Prompt Bank today and take control of your prompts like never before!
